txt.en: 'Dwarf beards lack flesh that will feed, but the coarse hair can be used to twist and deform your sapling, making the creature suffer at the hands of the bearded creatures. They will come to know the smell of the enemy and associate their painful growth with dwarf-kind. Its animosity will grow and further its corrupt spirit. It will be poisoned against another of the Free Peoples... all due to your contributions.'
Deliver dwarf-beards to Cinaid at Gramsfoot
'These will do nicely. Look how thick the hair is. It shall bind the limbs and twist the heart of this little creature. It shall be pliable to our whims and machination. We will make it ours.'
Cinaid ordered you to find dwarves, cut their beards from their chins and return them to him to feed to your sapling.
Deliver dwarf-beards to Cinaid at Gramsfoot ([placeholder]/7)

Cinaid directed you to collect dwarf-beards to use in creating a painful growth process for your sapling so that it will learn the scent of the dwarf and associate it with the pain of its adolescent growth.
